betterquesting:10.desc:8:
This can't be... was there an error in my calculations? This may look like your §o§3§b§oOverworld§f§o§o§r§f, but it is one of many mirror realms. In any case, it seems we have a much bigger problem than I thought. §c§oSomething§r§f must have somehow scrambled the realms.

     Hey, you know what? I did you a pretty big favor getting you out of §8§oLimbo§r§f, so now it's your turn to repay the favor. Investigate the cause of the apparent §4§6§o§m§m§l§m§r§o§l§6§o§lDimensional Shift§r§f for me. To that end, you probably have a long journey ahead of you, so I guess I can guide you along the way.

     Your first task is to explore this realm. There must be a clue around here somewhere. Punching trees is always a good place to start.
